pkgmetadata.longdescription: 2021 Ghana Population and Housing Census Results as Data Frames // Datasets from the 2021 Ghana Population and Housing Census Results. Users can access results as 'tidyverse' and 'sf'-Ready Data Frames. The data in this package is scraped from pdf reports released by the Ghana Statistical Service website https://census2021.statsghana.gov.gh/ . The package currently only contains datasets from the literacy and education reports. Namely, school attendance data for respondents aged 3 years and above.
